definitions.text: influence or control shrewdly or deviously
examples: He manipulated public opinion in his favor

definitions.text: hold something in one's hands and move it
tamper, with the purpose of deception
control (others or oneself) or influence skillfully, usually to one's advantage
examples: She is a very controlling mother and doesn't let her children grow up
The teacher knew how to keep the class in line

definitions.text: treat manually, as with massage, for therapeutic purposed
